pageTitle: Embassy Services - Embassy of the State of Palestine

header.title: Embassy Services
header.intro: The Embassy of the State of Palestine to the Republic of Turkey - Ankara, provides a range of consular, educational and cultural services to Palestinian citizens residing and visiting, in addition to its diplomatic tasks in strengthening bilateral relations between Palestine and Turkey.

consularServices.title: First: Consular Services
services: Issuing and renewing Palestinian passports (including cases of loss or damage).
Registration of births, deaths and personal events.
Authentication of marriage and divorce contracts.
Certification of official documents (academic certificates, birth certificates, personal status documents, and others).
Issuing no objection certificates and entry permits.
Assistance in legal and consular issues for citizens in Turkey.
Providing support in emergency cases and humanitarian procedures.
Issuing general and special power of attorney and organizing legal transactions in coordination with relevant authorities.

educationalServices.title: Second: Educational and Cultural Affairs
services: Providing guidance and information to Palestinian students wishing to study in Turkey.
Publishing the "Palestinian Student Guide in Turkey".
Organizing cultural events to promote Palestinian identity and introduce Palestinian heritage.
Coordination with Turkish educational institutions regarding Palestinian students.
Supporting youth initiatives and student activities.

publicRelations.title: Third: Public and Community Relations
services: Continuous communication with members of the Palestinian community in Turkey.
Organizing national events and official occasions in cooperation with Palestinian and Turkish institutions.
Receiving complaints and observations and following them up with relevant authorities.
